TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameCreationService

summary.span: 提供可以生成对象的唯一名称的服务。

span.span: Provides a service that can generate unique names for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以实现此服务，以便为设计器提供为对象创建新的唯一名称的方法。A can implement this service to provide a way for a designer to create new, unique names for objects. 如果该服务不可用，则设计器将使用默认实现。If this service is not available, the designer uses a default implementation. ## Examples 下面的示例代码提供了一个示例 实现。The following example code provides an example implementation. 服务可以基于与指定容器中的任何名称不匹配的类型创建唯一名称。The service can create a unique name based on a type that does not match any names in the specified container. 它还可以验证指定的名称字符串。It can also validate a specified name string. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateName (System.ComponentModel.IContainer container, Type dataType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateName(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container, class System.Type dataType) cil managed
Public Function CreateName (container As IContainer, dataType As Type) As String
abstract member CreateName : System.ComponentModel.IContainer * Type -> string

param.name: container
param.span: 将新对象添加到的容器。

span.span: The container where the new object is added.

param.name: dataType
param.span: 接收该名称的对象的数据类型。

span.span: The data type of the object that receives the name.

summary.span: 创建一个新名称，该名称对于指定容器中的所有组件来说是唯一的。

span.span: Creates a new name that is unique to all components in the specified container.
A unique name for the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回指定容器中唯一的新对象的名称。This method returns a name for the new object that is unique within the specified container. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个示例 方法实现。The following code example provides an example method implementation. 方法可以基于指定类型的名称创建一个名称，该名称对于指定容器中的组件名称是唯一的。The method can create a name based on the name of a specified type that is unique to the names of the components within the specified container. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

para.span: 这种类型的服务通常实现为从数据类型名称创建唯一的对象名称，通常追加数字，使名称成为唯一标识符。

span.span: This type of service is often implemented to create a unique object name from the name of the data type, often appended with a number that allows the name to be a unique identifier.

para.span: 例如， 对于 对象。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidName(string name) cil managed
Public Function IsValidName (name As String) As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定名称是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.

returns.span: 如果该名称有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the name is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现 可具有为有效名称定义参数的规则。An implementation of the can have rules that define the parameters for valid names. 可以实现此方法以验证名称并强制实施这些规则。This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个示例 方法实现。The following code example provides an example method implementation. 方法使用字符串验证方案来检查指定字符串的每个字符，以确定指定的字符串是否为有效的名称。The method uses a string validation scheme that examines each character of the specified string to determine whether the specified string is a valid name. `true`如果字符串有效，则方法返回; 否则返回 `false` 。The method returns `true` if the string is valid, or `false` otherwise. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateName(string name) cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定名称是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现 可具有为有效名称定义参数的规则。An implementation of the can have rules that define the parameters for valid names. 可以实现此方法以验证名称并强制实施这些规则。This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules. 此方法类似于 ，不同之处在于如果名称无效，则此方法将引发异常。This method is similar to , except that this method throws an exception if the name is invalid. 这允许实现者提供异常消息中的详细信息。This allows implementers to provide detailed information in the exception message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了 一个示例方法实现，它使用一个字符串验证方案来检查指定字符串的每个字符，以确定指定的字符串是否为有效的名称。The following code example provides an example method implementation that uses a string validation scheme that examines each character of the specified string to determine whether the specified string is a valid name. 如果字符串无效，则该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the string is not valid. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#4)]
